skills.name: Selenium
skills.description: Expert in building scalable automation frameworks with Selenium WebDriver. Skilled in test optimization, cross-browser testing, and integrating with CI/CD pipelines.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: Strong advocate for type safety with expertise in TypeScript‚Äôs advanced types, generics, and type inference. Building robust, type-safe applications and libraries.

skills.name: Playwright
skills.description: Building scalable end-to-end test automation frameworks with Playwright. Proficient in cross-browser testing, parallel execution, and integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Experienced in building scalable, high-performance applications with Java. Skilled in object-oriented programming, multithreading, and frameworks like Spring Boot and Hibernate.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Proficient in Python for automation, data analysis, and backend development. Expertise in libraries like Flask, Django, Pandas, and NumPy for building efficient solutions.

skills.name: Automation Testing
skills.description: Experienced in test automation frameworks and strategies, with a focus on improving test coverage, speed, and reliability. Proficient in Selenium, Playwright, and API testing with tools like Postman and RestAssured.

skills.name: Azure Devops
skills.description: Skilled in leveraging Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipeline management, version control, and infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools like Azure Pipelines, Git, and Terraform.

skills.name: Generative/Agentic AI
skills.description: Experienced in building generative AI models using deep learning techniques. Knowledgeable in the development and deployment of agentic AI systems for automating decision-making processes.

experiences.description: Developing frameworks and analyzing feasibility for automation of Xpedeon Web and Mobile - Flagship Products
achievements: Developed smart AI solutions to reduce efforts in Automation.
Integrated MCP and code generation into web and mobile testing, reducing overall time required for writing locators and coding by 70%.
Use of Appium for Mobile Automation and Playwright for Web automation.
Integrated everything CI/CD using Azure Devops.

experiences.description: Lead end-to-end POCs, including client communication, requirement gathering, documentation, technology selection, and delivery.
achievements: Develop automation frameworks using TestNG, Cucumber, Appium (UIAutomator2, XCUITest, Flutter-Driver), Tosca, n8n, UiPath, and API automation with Postman and JavaScript.
Manage code with Git/GitHub and adapt to various scripting languages (Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, C#).
Built AI solutions through Amplify(an in-house LLM) to streamline Automation reducing 50% overall efforts and 70% efforts generating test data.
Deliver robust automation solutions as an individual contributor across diverse technologies.
Lead a team of 5 Automation Testers.

experiences.description: Automated web application testing using TestNG hybrid framework.
achievements: Tested web forms, landing pages, and websites for BMW Group Asia Pacific to ensure high quality and user experience.
Collaborated with development teams in an Agile environment, supporting sprints and defect resolution.
Tracked and managed defects using monday.com for streamlined bug reporting and workflow management.
Achieved 80% more efficient solutions through automation and process improvements.

testimonials.name: Nikhil S.
testimonials.text: Ankush is sincere, hardworking, technically sound and result-oriented professional. He has a great attitude towards work and is always willing to go the extra mile to ensure project success. A great team player and a quick learner.

testimonials.name: Akshay P.
testimonials.text: Working with John was a pleasure. His technical expertise and collaborative approach made every project a success. He has strong technical and analytics skills. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Rahul K.
testimonials.text: Ankush is a dedicated and skilled professional. His attention to detail and commitment to quality significantly contributed to our project's success. A valuable asset to any team.

blogPosts.title: Beyond the Search Bar: The Next Evolution in How We Find Information Online
blogPosts.excerpt: This article aims to shed light on the silent but significant transformation happening in how we find information online. Change is coming ‚Äî not with a bang, but with an algorithm.

blogPosts.title: Low code, No code : The Future of Software Development?
blogPosts.excerpt: Low-code and no-code development platforms are transforming the software development landscape. By enabling users to create applications with minimal or no coding, these platforms are democratizing access to technology and accelerating innovation.

blogPosts.title: Impacts of AI driven Automation on Software Testing and Quality Assurance
blogPosts.excerpt: This is my MBA final year report which covers the integration of AI in software testing and quality assurance is revolutionizing the industry. AI-driven automation enhances testing efficiency, accuracy, and coverage, enabling faster release cycles and improved software quality.
